Four things people have to give up and p: Distrust in the Buddha that causes an uneducated ordinary person to be reborn in a bad place
Experiential confidence in the Buddha that causes an educated noble disciple to be reborn in a good place
Distrust in the teaching that causes an uneducated ordinary person to be reborn in a bad place
Experiential confidence in the teaching that causes an educated noble disciple to be reborn in a good place
Distrust in the Saṅgha that causes an uneducated ordinary person to be reborn in a bad place
Experiential confidence in the Saṅgha that causes an educated noble disciple to be reborn in a good place
Unethical conduct that causes an uneducated ordinary person to be reborn in a bad place
Ethical conduct loved by the noble ones that causes an educated noble disciple to be reborn in a good place
